text: Charles Babbage announced his difference engine in a paper to the Royal Astronomical Society entitled "Note on the application of machinery to the computation of astronomical and mathematical tables".
The U.S. Census Bureau officially put UNIVAC I into service calling it the world's first commercial computer.
The European Space Research Organization, which would become the European Space Agency, was established in Paris.
NASA launched Mariner 5 on its mission to fly by Venus.
